ResearchProjectDef.label: land fill
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basic to change the hostile terrain around you. This unlocks basic bridges, primitive soil, neutral soil and other research projects like flagstone road and super rich soil.

ResearchProjectDef.label: water shallow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to drop water on diggable terrains until form passable shallow water. Useful to set up soils or slow down enemies but require a lot of work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sliding floor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to drop different stuffs on floor to better walk speed. It's fast to build and don't require much resources but deteriorate over time.\n\nNot much useful on mud or marsh.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bridges
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build metallic and stone bridges on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh). They are more efficient than basic bridge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple road
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build a simple road on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to efficient walk.

ResearchProjectDef.label: light foundation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build foundations on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to set support to light builds (especially to improve the walk speed of bridges).

ResearchProjectDef.label: indoor soil
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to place a very simple soil on floors to slowly grow crops indoors.\n\nNeeds potatoes to be placed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: water deep
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transform a existent unstable terrain (water, mud and marsh) on deep water. Not so deep like natural deep water but hard to walk. Very useful to slow down enemies but require a lot of work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced slide
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced slide has special mechanisms to walk really fast, better than other slides.

ResearchProjectDef.label: powered bridge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Powered bridge has special mechanisms to walk really fast, better than other bridges.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flagstone road
ResearchProjectDef.description: Road built from chunks, much more efficient than simple roads.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy foundation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build foundations on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to set support to heavy builds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: super rich soil
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to place super rich soil directly on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh). It's the most growable soil of the galaxy.\n\nNeeds corn and devilstrand to be placed.
